org.xchain.framework.jxpath

Interface QNameVariables

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.commons.jxpath.Variables
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ScopedQNameVariables
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QNameVariablesImpl, ScopedQNameVariablesImpl

    public interface QNameVariables
extends org.apache.commons.jxpath.Variables
    An extension the Variables interface that properly resolves namespace prefixes.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett

      • getVariable

        Gets a variable by the specified qName.

        Returns:
        the value of the variable or null if the variable could not be found.

      • isDeclaredVariable

        Returns true if the specified qName is defined, false otherwise.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
